name: Reporting & BI System Manager
description:
SANOFI UKRAINE, one of the leading pharmaceutical companies, announces the position of Reporting & BI System Manager.

JOB PURPOSE:

Contributes to Central Europe region performance development by building a strong collaboration within the assigned GBU and across the organization.

Responsible for data mining, data visualization, data tools and infrastructure, and best practices to help organizations to make more data-driven decisions.

This position also responsible to operate Sanofi’s transparency system and its procedure, with the purpose the related business information and documents are well put by users, recorded and saved in the system.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

Business Intelligence (BI) system management

  • Responsible for the overall direction, coordination, implementation and execution of Business Intelligence projects ensuring consistency with company strategy and goals.
  • Implement performance tracking systems, market data and planning tool, designed to compile information about market and performance across different channels.
  • Manage businesses use technology to gain insight about the market, Sanofi performance.
  • Ensuring the database is correct, BI system is working effectively. Working closely with all departments to ensure the BI systems work effectively for all aspects of the company.
  • Analyse and monitor users’ activities, reacts quickly to recommend and promote efficient solutions.

Reporting

  • Manage all data for transactional sources and prepare effective reports.
  • Manage affiliate performance tracking. Prepare and visualized regular KPIs, ad hoc reporting.
  • Raise attention on early sign, to identify business risks.

Act as the company representative of transparency requirement implementation in the organization:

  • Act as the company representative of transparency requirement implementation in the organization.
  • Act as subject matter expert on reporting requirements.
  • Partner with Legal on interpretation of reporting regulations & requirements.
  • Point of contact for all employees and all third party vendors related to Transparency for training, access, data monitoring.
  • Investigate, collaborate, and establish processes with the Business and other relevant Departments to ensure compliance with Transparency Reporting policies.
  • Review Transparency Reportable data with business units within appropriate frames.
  • Provide feedback to dispute resolution and assist in resolution of external Health care providers/Health care organizations complaints and issues.
  • Assist in the implement remediation of audit findings through to conclusion.

Establish and maintain regular monitoring schedules of data sources:

  • Create Queries
  • Create Reports
  • Establish controls, alerts and audit criteria

Quality review and control:

  • Establish auditing and monitoring schedule
  • Ensure quality procedures are implemented and adhered
  • Ensure data process flows are established
  • Document any deviations from policy and process

REQUIREMENTS:

Education:

  • University Degree: Economics, Finance, Audit, Business administration, Informatics

Experience & knowledge:

    • Experience on position as Sales analyst/ Data analyst at least 2 years
    • Good understanding of / experience in Pharma Industry preferred
    • Auditing experience preferred
    • Technical proficiency

Behavior & soft skills:

  • Managing complexity
  • Must possess analytical and problem solving skills
  • Manage Vendor interaction
  • Master data maintenance
  • Primary helpdesk function for enquiries and complaints from users
  • Work with key internal customers to understand their business processes relating to interactions with External Experts resulting in becoming a true business partner
  • Ensure timely, accurate and thorough communication of all reporting related information to appropriate customers.

LANGUAGE AND IT SKILLS

  • Upper Intermediate English, Fluent Ukrainian, knowledge of Hungarian will be a plus
  • Informatical/Computer literacy
  • Advanced level knowledge of MS Word, MS Excel, Pivot table, MS PowerPoint

COMPANY OFFERS:

  • Professional and career growth opportunities;
  • Competitive remuneration and social package;
  • Work and development in highly professional team.
